Name of Skill

Software User Interface Design


Classification of Skill

Software Design Process


Prerequisites for Skill

Requirement Data Gathering
- Must be able to gather UI Requirement from the stakholders.
Analyzing
- The business requirement needs to be converted into a technical solution or a prototype, so proper analytical mindset is required for that.
Design, Prototype & Constructing
- Should be able to give shape to the requirements and produce the tangible product.
Evaluation
- Should be able to test the application for usuabilty issues.

Related Software Engineering Area(s)

User Interface Designing can be linked to various spheres of software engineering, some of them are listed below:

Software Testing & Evaluation
- Usuabilty Testing
Software Construction
- API Construction
